channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Exposure to stress during early pregnancy affects offspring into adulthood
item.description: Maternal stress hormone levels during early pregnancy can have a lasting effect on the stress system of the offspring. The results of a long-term stud...

item.title: AI in cell research: Moscot reveals cell dynamics in unprecedented detail

item.title: T cells rise up to fight infections in the gut

item.title: Fighting experience plays key role in brain chemical's control of male aggression

item.title: Fossil discovery in the Geiseltal Collection: Researchers identify unique bird skull
